Profile
I am a highly motivated and detail-oriented Data Science Engineer with a strong foundation in 
programming, machine learning, and data analytics. Equipped with a solid academic background in 
Computer Engineering and hands-on experience in Python for Data Science, I have successfully 
applied my expertise to real-world projects such as 'Face and Iris-Based Attendance System.' My 
proficiency in tools like Python, Hadoop, and relational databases, combined with my ability to 
extract actionable insights from complex datasets, positions me as a versatile professional ready to 
solve challenging problems.

Projects
Face and Iris Based Attendence System
based on Deep Learning
Designed and developed a desktop-based application in Python to automate attendance tracking 
using facial and iris recognition. The system employs advanced image processing and machine 
learning algorithms for precise identification and verification. Features include real-time data 
capture, secure storage, and detailed reporting. This project showcases expertise in Python 
programming, computer vision (OpenCV), and biometric authentication systems, providing a 
reliable and efficient solution for attendance management.
Salon Management System
System Based Application
Developed a desktop-based application using C# to streamline salon operations, including 
customer management, appointment scheduling, service tracking, and billing. Designed an intuitive 
user interface for seamless navigation and integrated backend support for efficient data handling. 
The system enhanced operational efficiency, improved customer experience, and demonstrated 
proficiency in object-oriented programming and desktop application development.
